title: 3 different Pixel 3, all with issues, one died. Google has the worst after sales service.
content:
Hello,

Got two brand new Pixel 3 two years ago (September 2019).
After one year of careful use, one ended up with microphone while the other with camera issues.

Google replaced both phones with two refurbished Pixel 3 which in my opinion was not fair.. A 700 EUR phone under warranty should be replaced with a new phone.

Anyhow, I have accepted the offer and after 6 months, my refurbished phone got bricked.
Google support gave me the best solution "Your phone is no longer under warranty. Sorry for the inconvenience.".

The local service spot told me it's a hardware problem and it's not worth fixing it. 700 EUR for two years is ridiculous.

My first smartphone was an IPhone 3g and after that I got almost every Nexus and Pixel released.
Unfortunately, Google has hugely disappointed me.

Thanks
